name: incuriously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you are not interested in knowing what is happening, or not do not want to discover anything new: They looked up incuriously for a moment, then went back to their chat. They swayed gently, watching me incuriously, seemingly content.
More examplesFewer examples"What do you do?" he said incuriously, looking around the room for someone else to talk to.The huge animal looked at us incuriously, and decided that we just did not matter. Only a few of the men looked up and gazed incuriously as we rode past.
